title: Vase, ca. 1870–80
creditline: Gift of Ruth Friedman in memory of Harry G. Friedman
description: A black bulbous vase with a small neck. Vase depicts a flock of white birds flying around the top of the vase. Both top and bottom of the vase have the same, small, decorative band around it.

tombstone.epitaph:
Vase, ca. 1870–80.
ca. 1870–80. Enamel on copper, nickel. Gift of Ruth Friedman in memory of Harry G. Friedman. 1966-3-3.
